Description.Value: Add ACADeclined Note to ACA Record

data.MacroScript:
'-ACA Record Data set aca_data = RecordLoop.Data aca_data.Edit
'-Validate if (aca_data.Fields("Type").Value <> "Result") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record Type must be Result." end if if IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have a Notify Note." else set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal if (note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value <> "ACANotifyOffer") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have an Offer Notify Note." end if end if if not IsNull(aca_data.Fields("ResponseNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record already has a Response." end if
'-Create a new PR Note record: note_type = "ACADeclined" note_desc = "Declined coverage"
set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.New note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value = note_type note_data.Fields("NoteDate").Value = now note_data.Fields("Description").Value = note_desc note_data.Fields("References/Employees").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal note_data.Fields("References/Records").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PRACARecord").Value note_data.Save
RecordLoop.Results.Add note_data RecordLoop.AddMessage note_type + " Note created"
'-Update the selected ACA Record: aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = False aca_data.Fields("ResponseNote").ValueInternal = note_data.Fields("PRNote").Value aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = True aca_data.Save

Description.Value: Add ACASelected Note to ACA Record

data.MacroScript:
'-ACA Record Data set aca_data = RecordLoop.Data aca_data.Edit
'-Validate if (aca_data.Fields("Type").Value <> "Result") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record Type must be Result." end if if IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have a Notify Note." else set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal if (note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value <> "ACANotifyOffer") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have an Offer Notify Note." end if end if if not IsNull(aca_data.Fields("ResponseNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record already has a Response." end if
'-Create a new PR Note record: note_type = "ACASelected" note_desc = "Selected plan"
set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.New note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value = note_type note_data.Fields("NoteDate").Value = now note_data.Fields("Description").Value = note_desc note_data.Fields("References/Employees").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal note_data.Fields("References/Records").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PRACARecord").Value note_data.Save
RecordLoop.Results.Add note_data RecordLoop.AddMessage note_type + " Note created"
'-Update the selected ACA Record: aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = False aca_data.Fields("ResponseNote").ValueInternal = note_data.Fields("PRNote").Value aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = True aca_data.Save

Description.Value: Create Expire pdf and Email or Print per DistributionEmail

data.MacroScript:
dim aca_data set aca_data = recordloop.data aca_data.Edit
'Stop
'-Validate ACA Record if (aca_data.Fields("Type").Value <> "Result") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record Type must be Result." end if if IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have a Notify Note." end if if not IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifiedNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record already has a Notified Note." end if
RecordLoop.AddMessage "PREmployee GUID on this ACARecord" + aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal
Dim employee_data Set employee_data = company.Payroll.PREmployee
employee_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal
' --- Collect Dictionary Content for Word document --- with dictContent dictContent.RemoveAll
' -- Employee Information .Add "ccEmployeeCode" , employee_data.Code .Add "ccEmployeeName", employee_data.FirstNameFirst .Add "ccEmployeeBirthDate", employee_data.BirthDate
' -- ACA Result Record Information .Add "ccACAStabilityBegin", aca_data.Fields("StabilityPeriodBegin").Value .Add "ccACAStabilityEnd", aca_data.Fields("StabilityPeriodEnd").Value
end with
dim working_word_file working_word_file = tmp_folder + "\Employee_HealthInsExpire.docx"
fso.CopyFile tmp_word_file, working_word_file
dim word_file set word_file = fso.GetFile(working_word_file) word_file.Attributes = word_file.Attributes xor 1
dim word_doc set word_doc = word_object.Documents.Open(working_word_file)
Word_tools.ReplaceContentControls word_doc, dictContent
dim pdf_filename pdf_filename = tmp_folder + "\Employee_HealthInsExpire_" + dictContent("ccEmployeeCode") + ".pdf" word_doc.ExportAsFixedFormat pdf_filename, 17 word_doc.Close False
if (fso.FileExists(pdf_filename)) then
sendToEmail = "" if (employee_data.DistributionEmail = "H") then sendToEmail = employee_data.HomeEmail elseif (employee_data.DistributionEmail = "W") then sendToEmail = employee_data.WorkEmail end if
if (sendToEmail <> "") then '-Email the pdf RecordLoop.AddMessage "Emailing " + pdf_filename Set objEmail = CreateObject("Outlook.Application") Set EmailItem = objEmail.CreateItem(olMailItem)
With EmailItem .To = sendToEmail .Subject = "ACA Health Coverage Expire" .Body = "Please see the attached notification and take appropriate actions." .Attachments.Add pdf_filename .Send End With note_desc = "Expire sent via Email to " + sendToEmail Else '-Print the pdf RecordLoop.AddMessage "Printing " + pdf_filename CreateObject("Shell.Application").Namespace(0).ParseName(pdf_filename).InvokeVerbEx("Print") note_desc = "Expire sent via Print" end if
'-Create a new Note note_type = "ACANotified"
set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.New note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value = note_type note_data.Fields("NoteDate").Value = now note_data.Fields("Description").Value = note_desc note_data.Fields("References/Employees").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal note_data.Fields("References/Records").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("RecordNumber").Value note_data.Save
note_data.Fields("Attachments").Items.Add pdf_filename
RecordLoop.Results.Add note_data RecordLoop.AddMessage note_type + " Note created for " + employee_data.FirstNameFirst RecordLoop.AddMessage "and attached " & document_name & " to this new note."
'-Update the selected ACA Record aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = False aca_data.Fields("NotifiedNote").ValueInternal = note_data.Fields("PRNote").Value aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = True aca_data.Save
'-Clear the Recall Date from the "NotifyNote" note note_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").Value if (CStr(note_data.Fields("Number").Value) = aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").Value) then note_data.Edit note_data.Fields("RecallDate").Value = Null
note_data.Save else RecordLoop.AddMessage "Did not update the Recall Date" end if
else RecordLoop.AddMessage "Error: The Expire document was not created." End if
'fso.DeleteFile working_word_file 'fso.DeleteFile pdf_filename
data.MacroScriptInit:
dim word_object set word_object = CreateObject("Word.Application")
'stop
dim dictContent set dictContent = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
dim macro_data set macro_data = company.Administration.Macro macro_data.Locate "ACA Notify Employee of Expire" dim tmp_word_file tmp_word_file = macro_data.Attachments.SaveAsTempFile("Employee_HealthInsExpire.docx") 'msgbox tmp_word_file
dim note_data set note_data = company.Payroll.PRNote
dim fso set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") dim tmp_folder tmp_folder = fso.GetParentFolderName(tmp_word_file)
data.Memo:
For each ACA Record selected this macro does the following: 1. Validation (Displays error and skips record when not valid) a. Must be an ACA Result record, not a Designation record b. Must have a Notify Note referenced c. Must not already have a Notified Note 2. Creates a PDF file to be used as the Employee Health Insurance Expire a. Using a Word template file: Employee_HealthInsExpire.docx (Attached) b. The PDF includes the Employee name, Coverage Begin date and other helpful info about the employee c. The Word template can be easily modified for coverage options and layout 3. Email the PDF to employees (when the Employee record has DistributionEmail selected) 4. Print the PDF for employee (when the Employee record has NO DistributionEmail selected) 5. Create Notified Note records with the PDF attached and the Note Description stating how the employee was notified (via Print or via Email to <email address>) 6. Update the reference field of the ACA Result record with the GUID of the Notified Note record that was just created
Setup Instructions: 1. Create an Activity Macro record on the company database a. Export this macro and the "Word-Tools" macro that is also used b. Import the resulting xml in the Activity Macro folder of the target company 2. Modify the Word template attachment to reflect the Insurance options at this customer site
HR Staff Instructions for how to use this Activity Macro: 1. Click the “Pending Notification of Expire” link on the ACA Monthly Operations dashboard gadget. 2. Select the employees listed in the filtered view of ACA Result Records 3. Run the Activity Macro named ACA Notify Employee of Expire 4. Verify any PDFs that print to your default printer match the newly created Note records with a description saying “Notified via Print” a. Of course any printed notification must be delivered to the employee 5. Verify sent email from Outlook matches the newly created Note records with a description saying “Notified via Email sent to <email address>”

Description.Value: Create Offer pdf and Email or Print per DistributionEmail

data.MacroScript:
'option explicit
dim aca_data set aca_data = recordloop.data aca_data.Edit
'Stop
'-Validate ACA Record if (aca_data.Fields("Type").Value <> "Result") then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record Type must be Result." end if if IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record does not have a Notify Note." end if if not IsNull(aca_data.Fields("NotifiedNote").ValueInternal) then Err.Raise vbObjectError, "MacroSource", "The ACA Record already has a Notified Note." end if
RecordLoop.AddMessage "PREmployee GUID on this ACARecord" + aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal
Dim employee_data Set employee_data = company.Payroll.PREmployee
employee_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal
' --- Collect Dictionary Content for Word document --- with dictContent dictContent.RemoveAll
' -- Employee Information .Add "ccEmployeeCode" , employee_data.Code .Add "ccEmployeeName", employee_data.FirstNameFirst .Add "ccEmployeeBirthDate", employee_data.BirthDate
' -- ACA Result Record Information .Add "ccACAStabilityBegin", aca_data.Fields("StabilityPeriodBegin").Value .Add "ccACAStabilityEnd", aca_data.Fields("StabilityPeriodEnd").Value
end with
dim working_word_file working_word_file = tmp_folder + "\Employee_HealthInsOffer.docx"
fso.CopyFile tmp_word_file, working_word_file
dim word_file set word_file = fso.GetFile(working_word_file) word_file.Attributes = word_file.Attributes xor 1
dim word_doc set word_doc = word_object.Documents.Open(working_word_file)
Word_tools.ReplaceContentControls word_doc, dictContent
dim pdf_filename pdf_filename = tmp_folder + "\Employee_HealthInsOffer_" + dictContent("ccEmployeeCode") + ".pdf" word_doc.ExportAsFixedFormat pdf_filename, 17 word_doc.Close False
dim sendToEmail if (fso.FileExists(pdf_filename)) then
sendToEmail = "" if (employee_data.DistributionEmail = "H") then sendToEmail = employee_data.HomeEmail elseif (employee_data.DistributionEmail = "W") then sendToEmail = employee_data.WorkEmail end if
if (sendToEmail <> "") then '-Email the pdf RecordLoop.AddMessage "Emailing " + pdf_filename Set objEmail = CreateObject("Outlook.Application") Set EmailItem = objEmail.CreateItem(olMailItem)
With EmailItem .To = sendToEmail .Subject = "ACA Health Coverage Offer" .Body = "Please complete attached option form and return to the Human Resources department." .Attachments.Add pdf_filename .Send End With note_desc = "Offer sent via Email to " + sendToEmail Else '-Print the pdf RecordLoop.AddMessage "Printing " + pdf_filename CreateObject("Shell.Application").Namespace(0).ParseName(pdf_filename).InvokeVerbEx("Print") note_desc = "Offer sent via Print" end if
'-Create a new Note note_type = "ACANotified"
set note_data = Company.Payroll.PRNote note_data.New note_data.Fields("PRNoteType").Value = note_type note_data.Fields("NoteDate").Value = now note_data.Fields("Description").Value = note_desc note_data.Fields("References/Employees").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("PREmployee").ValueInternal note_data.Fields("References/Records").Items.Add aca_data.Fields("RecordNumber").Value note_data.Save
note_data.Fields("Attachments").Items.Add pdf_filename
RecordLoop.Results.Add note_data RecordLoop.AddMessage note_type + " Note created for " + employee_data.FirstNameFirst RecordLoop.AddMessage "and attached " & document_name & " to this new note."
'-Update the selected ACA Record aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = False aca_data.Fields("NotifiedNote").ValueInternal = note_data.Fields("PRNote").Value aca_data.Fields("IsLocked").Value = True aca_data.Save
'-Clear the Recall Date from the "NotifyNote" note note_data.Locate aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").Value if (CStr(note_data.Fields("Number").Value) = aca_data.Fields("NotifyNote").Value) then note_data.Edit note_data.Fields("RecallDate").Value = Null
note_data.Save else RecordLoop.AddMessage "Did not update the Recall Date" end if
else RecordLoop.AddMessage "Error: The Offer document was not created." End if
'fso.DeleteFile working_word_file 'fso.DeleteFile pdf_filename
data.MacroScriptInit:
dim word_object set word_object = CreateObject("Word.Application")
'stop
dim dictContent set dictContent = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
dim macro_data set macro_data = company.Administration.Macro macro_data.Locate "ACA Notify Employee of Offer" dim tmp_word_file tmp_word_file = macro_data.Attachments.SaveAsTempFile("Employee_HealthInsOffer.docx") 'msgbox tmp_word_file
dim note_data set note_data = company.Payroll.PRNote
dim fso set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") dim tmp_folder tmp_folder = fso.GetParentFolderName(tmp_word_file)
data.Memo:
For each ACA Record selected this macro does the following: 1. Validation (Displays error and skips record when not valid) a. Must be an ACA Result record, not a Designation record b. Must have a Notify Note referenced c. Must not already have a Notified Note 2. Creates a PDF file to be used as the Employee Health Insurance Offer a. Using a Word template file: Employee_HealthInsOffer.docx (Attached) b. The PDF includes the Employee name, Coverage Begin date and other helpful info about the employee c. The Word template can be easily modified for coverage options and layout 3. Email the PDF to employees (when the Employee record has DistributionEmail selected) 4. Print the PDF for employee (when the Employee record has NO DistributionEmail selected) 5. Create Notified Note records with the PDF attached and the Note Description stating how the employee was notified (via Print or via Email to <email address>) 6. Update the reference field of the ACA Result record with the GUID of the Notified Note record that was just created
Setup Instructions: 1. Create an Activity Macro record on the company database a. Export this macro and the "Word-Tools" macro that is also used b. Import the resulting xml in the Activity Macro folder of the target company 2. Modify the Word template attachment to reflect the Insurance options at this customer site
HR Staff Instructions for how to use this Activity Macro: 1. Click the “Pending Notification of Offer” link on the ACA Monthly Operations dashboard gadget. 2. Select the employees listed in the filtered view of ACA Result Records 3. Run the Activity Macro named ACA Notify Employee of Offer 4. Verify any PDFs that print to your default printer match the newly created Note records with a description saying “Notified via Print” a. Of course any printed notification must be delivered to the employee 5. Verify sent email from Outlook matches the newly created Note records with a description saying “Notified via Email sent to <email address>”

Description.Value: Mark ACA Calendar Detail as Processed

data.MacroScript:
'-ACA Calendar Data dim ACACal_data set ACACal_data = RecordLoop.Data
'-ACA Calendar Detail Data dim ACACalDetail_data set ACACalDetail_data = ACACal_data.CalendarDetail ACACalDetail_data.Edit
'-Update the selected ACA Calendar Detail record: ACACalDetail_data.Fields("Description").Value = "Processed"
'-Save the ACA Calendar record ACACal_data.Save
